name: spo-get-agent-list
title: Get SharePoint Agents
shortDescription: Get a list of SharePoint Agents from SharePoint Online site and export agent metadata and contents to CSV.
longDescription: This script will get all the SharePoint agents from the SharePoint document libraries and export the data to a CSV file. Data includes agent name, description, instructions, welcome message, conversation starters, capabilities, referenced URLs, site IDs, web IDs, list IDs, and unique IDs.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
